Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.edrs

Contains classes and interfaces for retrieving data directly from an external data source in a Data Acquisition project.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExternalDataItemRetriever
    A mechanism that provides direct access to data in an external data source that is identified through specified provenance information.
    IExternalDataRetrievalConnector
    A pair of methods that an external data retrieval service calls to retrieve Items from an external data source.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextResultMapping
    A mapping that associates the results in an ExternalDataContextResults or an ExternalDataContextItemsResults with the ProvenanceGroup that contained the CardProvenance that matched them.
    ExternalDataContextItemsResults
    A result container that contains the requested Items and ContextResultMappings that associate those Items with their CardProvenance.
    ExternalDataContextResults
    A result container that contains a Source that contains platform-compatible XML that describes the requested items, and ContextResultMappings that associate the requested items with their CardProvenance.

Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.edrs Description

Contains classes and interfaces for retrieving data directly from an external data source in a Data Acquisition project.
Since:
4.0
